channel.title: 🏢 Inria Centre of the University of Bordeaux on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Inria Centre of the University of Bordeaux on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Relating Hopfield Networks to Episodic Control
item.description: Neural Episodic Control’s differentiable dictionary is shown to be a Universal Hopfield Network, enabling improved performance and a novel evaluation criterion.
